content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was asked to determine the difficulty level of the Brno Reservoir Loop trail, which I found to be moderate on the AllTrails website. I was then asked to search for factors affecting the difficulty level of the trail, but the command returned an error and no text was summarized. I executed a ping command and a curl command on the AllTrails website and found that it has been moved to HTTPS. I then used Google to find information on the trail's length and difficulty level, but browsing the AllTrails website and Google did not provide any text to summarize.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ping -c 3 www.alltrails.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'/bin/sh: 1: ping: not found\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl -I www.alltrails.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b'HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently\r\nContent-Type: text/html\r\nContent-Length: 134\r\nConnection: keep-alive\r\nServer: awselb/2.0\r\nDate: Wed, 21 Jun 2023 11:52:11 GMT\r\nLocation: https://www.alltrails.com:443/\r\nX-Cache: Miss from cloudfront\r\nVia: 1.1 8c71fe23914182493dae4cb15c841346.cloudfront.net (CloudFront)\r\nX-Amz-Cf-Pop: VIE50-P1\r\nX-Amz-Cf-Id: tFeYk2gu20dZ2w7KieysSOhktnXqeGB1RRo9tr5KhSlxqhDXJV8ywA==\r\n\r\n'

Links: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir Loop trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g274714-d6701144-Reviews-Brno_Dam-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/trail-running", "https://www.visitczechrepublic.com/en-US/51ec04b5-cfca-4a8e-9db5-25931861965a/place/s-znojmo-cycling-trails", "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/lake"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the terrain like on the Brno Reservoir Loop trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the Brno Reservoir Loop trail in Czechia. The trail is not a complete loop around the reservoir, but there are sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk available for running. The area is hilly and there is approximately 8 km of decent running in the reservoir area. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. Additionally, there are options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, including quiet, low trafficked roads and trails in the Junák hiking area.

Links: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/home/atlas/Documents/maps"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command list_files returned: []', type='action_result')]
"""
